item.description: What a great way to spend a crisp Winter Sunday morning! The walk takes about an hour and the water view is super. Come join us! We usually have a great turnout. After walk, weâ€™ll go to an area restaurant for lunch. No charge for walk. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84 Exit 39 (Rt. 4), turn right at light, go past UCONN Medical Center, entrance on left, follow road to back parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the back parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
